description: This module checks weather condition (via the OpenWeather or WeatherUnderground modules) and optional binary sensors to detect rain.
pop_threshold_helper: Sets the threshold for rain probability forecasts. Rain sensor will be triggered if threshold is exceeded.
rain_window: Rain detected while windows are open!
timeout_helper: Timeout in minutes to keep rain state after last rain was detected.
title: Virtual rain sensor
windows_helper: A list of window sensors that should be checked if rain starts. Will send a notification if open windows are detected.
